import React from "react"; import "./App.css"; function App() { const testimonials = [ { text: "I felt like such a loser before I joined HateHire; but now I am so much more confident and full of hatred!!", name: "Janice, 29", }, { text: "HateHire changed my perspective; now I embrace every challenge with absolute bitterness!", name: "Tom, 35", }, { text: "The best thing about HateHire is the sarcasm-filled training sessions!", name: "Alice, 27", }, ]; return (

HateHire
  • Browse Courses
  • Course History
  • Logout

Welcome to HateHire, where the work is as unique as you are!

Employee Testimonies

{testimonials.map((testimonial, index) => (

"{testimonial.text}"

~ {testimonial.name}

))}

© {new Date().getFullYear()} HateHire Ltd

); } export default App;
